original_text:
Threshing floors and winepresses will not feed the people;
    the new wine will fail them.
korean_text: 타작 마당이나 술틀이 그들을 기르지 못할 것이며 새 포도주도 떨어질 것이요

sentences.original_text: Threshing floors and winepresses will not feed the people
sentences.korean_translation: 타작 마당과 포도즙 짜는 곳은 백성을 먹이지 못할 것이요

sentences.original_text: the new wine will fail them
